name: Remove and Rearrange Menu
author: Brijesh Shah

sections.description: Remove and Rearrenge Menu is free. This plugin allow you easily to delete your menu link or move your menu link current position to whenever want position. You have to delete any menu link via one click you dont want to open this menu for delete.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload remove_and_rearrange_menu.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates

Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 5.6 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended
sections.faq:
Where can I get help or talk to other users about Remove and Reaarenge Menu?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the [Our Support Forum].

short_description: This is best way to get menu re-arrange and delete itself.
